programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep13
programme.desc: Grumblegard, Part 1 - While the others care for baby dragons at the roost, Dak, Winger, Burple and Aggro come face-to-face with a grumpy old dragon on a dangerous island.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep14
programme.desc: Grumblegard, Part 2 - The Rescue Riders plan to team up with the Slinkwings when an angry Grumblegard threatens Huttsgalor. But their old enemies may be up to new tricks.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep17
programme.desc: Hide The Lightning - Po and team go to the city of Tikal to get more information on the Protector, but it's easier said than done, since nobody in the town actually knows the identity of the Protector. Blade becomes increasingly frustrated and Po attempts to help her.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep18
programme.desc: The Beast - Po and team play a game of Pok-ta-pok against a family of armadillos for the opportunity to talk one on one with Zuma, the leader. The game brings out a highly competitive and aggressive side to Blade, known as "The Beast." Back in China, Colin and Weimin find the Pirate Queen and become part of her pirate crew.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep17
programme.desc: Moles - Jack Sprat and Puss journey underground in search of treasure and discovery a kingdom of moles led by a rather bizarre king.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep18
programme.desc: Mermaid - To prove he's a ladies' man, Puss rescues a mermaid, who instantly falls in love with him and becomes his worst nightmare

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep17
programme.desc: Lucky And The Field Trip Fraud - Lucky is determined to shed her reputation as teachers pet on the class field trip.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep18
programme.desc: Lucky And The Shaky Day - When an earthquake takes out the railroad bridge, the PALs must find a way to stop the oncoming train which Jim is aboard

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep9
programme.desc: Big Poppy / Neighbor War - When a troll starts to ruin the fun of open mic night Poppy is forced to enter a compliment battle.Branch tries to drive Sky Toronto away when he moves next door.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep9
programme.desc: Message in a Bubble / Glitteretti - Kelp has a new trick with his bubbles: he can have his friends put voice messages inside that you hear when you pop them. But when Pixie decides she doesnt want the others to hear whats in her bubble, the chase is on to rescue it! / Juniper is devastated when the traditional ceremony to celebrate her next level of spark achievement cant happen. Kelp helps introduce a new tradition.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep9
programme.desc: Dog the Right Thing - In preparation for the big race to determine the next Race Cadets, Sam Whippet challenges the Not Yet Cadets to build their own cars. The catch? The car parts are scattered throughout Pawston. \ The Not Yet Cadets compete in the final race to see which team will join the Race Cadets.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep9
programme.desc: Lost and Found / In the Park In the Dark - The Community Center's Lost and Found is full and it's up to the gang to use their detective skills and return the lost items to their original owners. / Rodney only needs one more bird on his birdwatching list, but the only problem is that it only comes out at night! Team Zenko must help Rodney face his fear of the dark so he can get the last picture for his collection.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep9
programme.desc: Home Alone - Aggro, Burple and Cutter are left alone in the roost to care for some dragon eggs, but a trio of tricky Slinkwings want those eggs for themselves.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep9
programme.desc: Out of the Cave and Onto Thin Ice - After a shocking revelation, Po is determined to get his chi back and Jing decides to face Jindiao

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City Ep3
programme.desc: Sewer Koi and the Museum Heist - An earth-shaking rumble signals the arrival of a new creature, but Yi and Jin butt heads, each convinced theyre the better team leader. The crew eventually discovers that the massive Sewer Koi is behind the earthquakes, but hes missing his precious pearl, the key to a magical underground dam. Without it, the sewers water levels will rise, threatening to overflow and flood the whole city! Its going to take a heist to extract the pearl from its display at a local museum, before its too late.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City Ep4
programme.desc: Peng vs. Peng - With the sudden closing of a local candy shop, NaiNai is busy trying to recreate its famous candied fruit. But after a late-night sugar binge in NaiNais stash, Peng starts acting strangely. It turns out that hes possessed by magical creatures! The Minticon are sugar-addicted puffball creatures, who previously lived in the old candy shop. Armed with her violin, Yi commands the creatures out of Pengs body, winning over the Minticon in the process.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk Ep5
programme.desc: Race to Fireworm Island - Snotlout is concerned when his dragons flame goes out and the kids have to figure out how to reignite it before its too late.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk Ep6
programme.desc: Fright of Passage - Once every 10 years, a mysterious glowing dragon visits Berk and this year Hiccup and Astrid are determined to find out where it's coming from and stop it from reaching the village.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk Ep7
programme.desc: Worst In Show - The gang competes to see who can best train a Terrible Terror, while Alvin is closing in on Berk.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep26
programme.desc: Wrinkles & Stickles - After Turtleneck is captured by Frederic Estes, Boss Baby and Tim attempt to rescue her, leading them to the terrifying "fun house" at the town fair

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep27
programme.desc: Bossa Nova - After Boss Baby is fired from Baby Corp;he attempts to navigate regular baby life in a Mommy/Daddy/Baby playgroup. Even worse;the playgroups other new member is Mega Fat;whose animatronic stuffie Wagby malfunctions and threatens the safety of the whole group. Meanwhile;Tim does everything he can to avoid doing his homework.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep28
programme.desc: The Museum Job - When the crowded bathroom situation at the local museum threatens baby love;Boss Baby leads his new team of playgroup babies on their first missionand then their SECOND mission after a klepto baby in their group swipes a priceless artifact. In a continued attempt to avoid homework;Tim joins Boss Baby on his mission.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep25
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Taxing Trauma of the Treacherous Tattle Trials Part I - In part one of a two-part season finale, the Melvins create a final exam that George and Harold will be sure to fail: the Doom Dome. To ensure success, Melvinborg injects Melvin's cells with nanobots, giving him heightened powers. But when George and Harold find out, they crank the nanobots to the max, causing Melvin to grow into a giant! The boys enlist Captain Underpants to fight the jealous nerd, but their victory only loses the nanobots onto Piqua...

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep26
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Taxing Trauma of the Treacherous Tattle Trials Part II - Part two of the season finale finds George, Harold, Captain Underpants, and the Melvins trapped in the Doom Dome with rampaging nanobots. When the humans try to neautralize the bots, they find a new host: Captain Underpants. Now they must shrink down to go into Captain Underpants brain and defeat the nanobots leader, Nanozero. But they need help: Captain Underpants brain cells to the rescue! And when its all over, George and Harold will finally be able to go to summer camp.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep27
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Worrisome Wedge of the Water Warmongers - Harold and George can't wait to spend the summer together at camp. But not so fast, boys -- your old nemesis Mr. Krupp has a most unpleasant surprise.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep9
programme.desc: Out of the Cave and Onto Thin Ice - After a shocking revelation, Po is determined to get his chi back and Jing decides to face Jindiao

programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Taxing Trauma of the Treacherous Tattle Trials Part II - Part two of the season finale finds George, Harold, Captain Underpants, and the Melvins trapped in the Doom Dome with rampaging nanobots. When the humans try to neautralize the bots, they find a new host: Captain Underpants. Now they must shrink down to go into Captain Underpants brain and defeat the nanobots leader, Nanozero. But they need help: Captain Underpants brain cells to the rescue! And when its all over, George and Harold will finally be able to go to summer camp.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep27
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Worrisome Wedge of the Water Warmongers - Harold and George can't wait to spend the summer together at camp. But not so fast, boys -- your old nemesis Mr. Krupp has a most unpleasant surprise.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep9
programme.desc: Struck Through The Heart / Boov Up And Drive - Oh has an electric spark when he and Tip do the ultimate best friend handshake./Tip can't get Slushious back until she passes a Boovian Driver's Test.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep9
programme.desc: Turbo Drift - The snails and Tito travel to Tokyo to film a commercial and Turbo is challenged to a drift race against a beautiful and mysterious female cricket.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep9
programme.desc: Sandstorm - The Dinotrux get caught in a powerful sandstorm that stops them in their tracks, which leaves Ty Rux and the Reptools to find a way to save them.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep9
programme.desc: The Strength of Scotland - Wally, Wenda and Wizard Whitebeard head to Scotland, where Odlulu is using the Strength Key to give her an advantage in the Highland Games. Wenda competes in the games alongside other Wanderers while Wally and Whitebeard try to get the key from an elusive Fritz!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep9
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Spring Lamb - Julian's preparing for spring has sprung, the Greendale school play, when pat gets a special delivery call. It's a yeti costume for Bill. When Pat is diverted into the countryside by PC Selby, he spots one of Alf's missing sheep - and she's about to have a lamb! Alf can't get there as his quad bike is being fixed, so Pat offers to take the sheep in his van. But the sheep is reluctant to move. Meanwhile, Bill is worried that his costume won't turn up and he'll let his classmates down. Out in the fields, Pat hits upon the idea of dressing up like a woolly sheep by putting on the yeti costume. It works! But there's another surprise in store as he delivers the sheep to alf at the school - she's had her lamb! Bill, Pat and lamb all play starring roles in the play. Mission Accomplished!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep9
programme.desc: Raa Raa's Noisy Present - Raa Raa has made his friend Topsy a wonderful present - a noisy set of chimes. But she doesn't want them. Who else in the jungle might like a very noisy set of wind chimes?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep9
programme.desc: The Case Of Deltoid's Strange Behaviour - Smartysaurus is upset because her best friend, Deltoid, keeps calling her a monster and running away from her. Noddy decides to investigate and find out why Deltoid's behaving so strangely. He soon discovers that Deltoid has lost all his memories and doesn't recognise any of his friends anymore. It takes all Noddy's powers of deduction and gathering evidence on the WhoWhatWhere Tablet to realise that Deltoid has lost his memory chip! All he has to do now is stop Deltoid trying to trap Smartysaurus long enough to refit the chip and restore his memories. Good luck Noddy!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep61
programme.desc: Pip's Playground - Pip is feeling bored and wants something new to play. Fifi has a brilliant idea and asks all the tots to help her build a playground for Pip as a surprise.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep10
programme.desc: Talent Show / Sad Sad Plant - Kelp writes a song about him and Scallop to perform at the unicorn show. But when it comes time, Scallop wants to keep the song just for them, leaving Kelp to come up with anew act- and fast! / The kids all visit the magical musical plant greenhouse on Unicorn Land. They each pick a plant to take care of, and for Kelp its a sad, almost dead plant that he falls in love with.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep10
programme.desc: Slobber Power - Cutter gets a chance to be a "mom" when a newly hatched dragon bonds with him, and they'll both be needed to get the others out of a tangled mess.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep8
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Jarring Jerkiness of the Judge J.O.R.T.S - George and Harold transform their new Spanish teacher into a superhero after they feel guilty for pranking him, but their teacher loves it and gets carried away

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep8
programme.desc: A Thread In The Dark - Klaus is injured and Verucas mage powers are not working, stifled by her time in prison. They encounter a dangerous village and Veruca reconnects with her abilities in time to save Klaus, but the two are soon captured by Po and Blade, who are unaware of Verucas rekindled powers.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep8
programme.desc: Into the Belly of the Den of the House of the Nest of Cats - Mom tries to help Tim get over his fear of the neighborhood crazy-cat-lady

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City Ep8
programme.desc: Toad-al Recall - A wish-granting toad drops into Yi and the crews life just as the dumpling shop is being reviewed by a food magazine writer. Overwhelmed by her efforts to help her mom and NaiNai in the shop, Yi asks the toad to spit up helpful items but Jin and Peng arent so selfless. As a result of granting an abundance of wishes for the whole crew, the toad becomes too weak to continue. Realizing the error of their ways and why the toad appeared in the first place, Yi and Everest use their magic to reverse the toads magic onto himself so he can wish himself home.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk Ep8
programme.desc: Appetite for Destruction - When different species of dragons are found on Dragon Island, the kids suspect that the Screaming Death might be back and it's up to an unlikely hero to save the day.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep8
programme.desc: Eye'll Be Watching You / Sorry Not Sorry - Convinced Troll Village is dangerous Branch makes a security plantPoppy creates an apology monster out of Gristle when teaching him how to make amends.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep15
programme.desc: Best Friends Day / The White Whale - Pixie loves to ride the clouds, but she can't understand why Kelp doesnt love it, too. If they don't agree on this, does that mean they're not best friends anymore? / Kelp helps Ollie fulfill his dream of watching the white whale migration.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep16
programme.desc: Shark and Pilot Fish / Theo - When shark and pilot fish are separated its up to Kelp, Scallop, Cruz, and Waverly to help them find each other again. / Scallops friend Theo finally comes clean on why hes always rushing off.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep15
programme.desc: Board Silly / Sing for the Fences - Tag and Scooch play Scoochs favorite board game outside, using the whole town of Pawston as the board. \Tag thinks its time for an update to the Pawston City Anthem, which inspires a city-wide music competition where competitors will create and perform new Pawston anthems.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep16
programme.desc: Fast Franks Fixit / Tail-Kwondo - When Tag is left in charge of the Pawston Pawtomotive for the day, Frank and Beans open up a rival garage and take all the business. But when all the cars around Pawston break down because of Frank's shoddy mechanic work, Tag and Scooch have to go around town to fix all his mistakes. \ Scooch wants to be a Tail-kwondo master like his hero, Master Wag, but he can't break a biscuit with his tail. Tag helps train him (and his tail), and they even track down Master Wag who gives Scooch a good luck charm. But when Scooch loses the good luck charm before his tail-kwondo test, he needs to find a way to believe in himself.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep15
programme.desc: Rodney J. Dinkle, Babysitter / Lights Out - When accident-prone Rodney gets hired to babysit a mischievous toddler, TZG secretly watches over their safety. / When theres a power outage in Harmony Harbor, TZG secretly helps the townsfolk beat the blackout.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep16
programme.desc: Double Booked / Gym Enemy Cricket - When both Sam and Gabriel pre-order the new Commander Kale comic but the supplier only sends one copy, TZG secretly ferries the comic book back and forth between readers. / When Fawna teaches a silent yoga class, TZG secretly find and remove a loud chirping cricket from the Community Center.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep15
programme.desc: Double Finked - Magnus's nephew, Axel, arrives on the island and tells the Rescue Riders that he wants to join their team. But is he just a trickster like his uncle?

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep16
programme.desc: Divewings - When sea-dwelling dragons called Divewings start attacking ships near the island, the Rescue Riders have to find out what's making them so upset.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep19
programme.desc: An Uphill Battle - The Dragon Knights make a deal for the Storm Wheel but first must obtain the other Storm Wheel from a mysterious mad scientist. Though Mastodon continues to warn the team about the dangers in using the Tianshang Weapons, they use them in a fight against Klaus and Veruca. The clash of the weapons wakes a dormant volcano!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep20
programme.desc: The Mad Scientist - The Mad Scientist turns out to be an ally called Akna, who has a history with Blade's brother Alfie. And Blade learns another truth about her brother and his mission. And in the course of a skirmish with Klaus and Veruca, the weapons change hands again.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep19
programme.desc: Bees - Puss is terrified by an invasion by a swarm of bees, which only the hippy-like Piper can control with her magic flute.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep20
programme.desc: Squad - Just as Puss is training the orphans to protect San Lorenzo, El Moco storms into town and cat-naps the swashbuckling hero.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep19
programme.desc: Lucky And The Golden Opportunity - When the PALs find gold, things spiral out of control until Lucky and Spirit have to rescue their friends from the bottom of a mine!

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep20
programme.desc: Lucky And The Lion - When a mountain lion is spotted in Miradero, no one is safe!

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep10
programme.desc: Remote Out of Control / Critter Comfort - Biggie takes Branchs superpowered remote but must return it before Branch finds outWhen Poppy builds a new home for a group of cute critters she accidentally attracts their predators.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep10
programme.desc: Talent Show / Sad Sad Plant - Kelp writes a song about him and Scallop to perform at the unicorn show. programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep10
programme.desc: All Paws on Deck / Bonestand and Deliver - Tag wants to do something special for her Mom and Paws anniversary, so she recreates the boat cruise where her parents first met. \ Tag discovers that nothing is planned for Pawstons 100th birthday, so she decides the town needs to rebuild the old Bonestand for a big Pawston concert.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep10
programme.desc: Longest Yardwork / The Girl Who Cried Goose - Donna plans a garden party for Rona, but the only problem is that her garden is overgrown and neglected. The team try to transform this jungle into a backyard just in time for the party. / Lula finds an angry goose on the loose, and Team Zenko need to get it out of the park before soccer camp starts.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep10
programme.desc: Slobber Power - Cutter gets a chance to be a "mom" when a newly hatched dragon bonds with him, and they'll both be needed to get the others out of a tangled mess.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep10
programme.desc: Return of the Four Constellations - The kids go to the Spirit Realm and meet the Original Four Constellations in the hopes of learning how to defeat Jindiao

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City Ep5
programme.desc: Jin's New Look - On the brink of his highly-anticipated White Coat Ceremony at school, Jin proudly dons his new white doctors coat around town, unwittingly drawing the attention of a creature named Morty. After a slobbery lick from Morty, Jin turns invisible! As Jin frantically tries to become re-visible, he discovers that Morty is very pregnant! Ultimately, Jin foregoes his ceremony and instead delivers Mortys five babies.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City Ep6
programme.desc: A Cabbage Kinda Day - Already stretched thin between responsibilities, Yi discovers one of Mortys babies still in her building. She attempts to juggle her various responsibilities dumpling shop work, violin, magical creature childcare!), but its too much and she accidentally loses Mini-Morty. Shes going to need help from Jin and Peng to find Mini-Morty and return the baby creature to her mother.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk Ep8
programme.desc: Appetite for Destruction - When different species of dragons are found on Dragon Island, the kids suspect that the Screaming Death might be back and it's up to an unlikely hero to save the day.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk Ep9
programme.desc: Zippleback Down - While searching for traps, Tuffnut, Barf and Belch get trapped themselves and a forest fire is approaching.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk Ep10
programme.desc: View To A Skrill (Part 1) - Bucket and Mulch accidentally discover a Skrill, and its up to the gang to save it from the Beserkers.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep29
programme.desc: Ga Ba Goo Ba Ga (The Babblist) - Theres a new babblist in town- someone who claims to understand baby talk. Boss Baby spots this fraud right away;and must debunk his tactics before he scams the playgroup parents. Meanwhile;Tim tries to sell magazines with Boss Babys help.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep30
programme.desc: The Coo Chi Coup - Boss Baby loves awards- and the Golden Rattle trophy is no exception. When presented with the chance to win an award at a company retreat;he must choose between his pride and his team.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep31
programme.desc: Lights, Camera, Org Chart! - Boss Baby creates an org chart to cement his leadership as the Boss of the playgroup babies. programme.desc: The Toy Cupboard - Peppa and George's toy basket is full and their beds are covered in toys. Mummy Pig orders a new toy cupboard, but it needs to be assembled and Mummy and Daddy Pig are not good at DIY.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep241
programme.desc: Pen Pal - Peppa has a French pen pal, a girl donkey, named Delphine. They also speak to each other on the telephone.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep242
programme.desc: Granny and Granpa's Attic - Peppa and George are helping Granny and Grandpa Pig tidy their attic, but it's hard to decide what to throw out. Amongst the clutter, Peppa finds an old record player and some funny old records.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep243
programme.desc: School Camp - Peppa and her friends are going camping with Madame Gazelle. When it gets dark, they all sing a song around the campfire.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep108
programme.desc: The Nap - Anna and her friends decide they should all take a nap to be in shape for their midnight pyjama party, but no one knows the best way to get to sleep and they each offer their own unique way to do it!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep109
programme.desc: The Bicycle - Bubu impresses his friends with a brand new bike he won in a contest. He encourages everyone else to ride it, Anna discovers why: Bubu doesn't know how to ride a two-wheeler!

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S03 Ep308
programme.desc: Cinnamon Buns / Souffl - For Chef's birthday, Chef and Olly follow clues on a journey that leads to a delicious surprise. // When a rumor spreads that Chef can't make a souffl, he is determined to show he can.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Quesadillas - Tiny Chef makes quesadillas but can't get his favorite jar of salsa open no matter how hard he and his friends try!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Trouble At The Truck Wash - When an overeager Crusher causes the Truck Wash to explode out into Axle City, Blaze and friends will need your help using angles to recover the pieces and get the trucks clean again!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S06 Ep618
programme.desc: The Fastest of them All - When a greedy queen casts a spell to make a few of our friends go slow, Blaze and AJ must race her for the magical cure

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep908
programme.desc: Pups Save the Hatchlings / Pups Save a Wrongway Farmhand - When Mayor Humdinger decides to make the world's biggest omelet, he accidentally orders the wrong kind of eggs - ones that hatch.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep912
programme.desc: Pups Stop the Return of Humsquatch / Pups Save a Lonely Ghost - When Eddie and Emmy get impatient at the carnival, they hide in Mayor Humdinger's Humsquatch costume to chase everyone out.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep324
programme.desc: Pups Save a Giant Plant - Buddy - Mayor Goodways gesture of goodwill gift grows wildly out of control when its planted in the wrong place. Time for a transplant!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep115
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A School / The Crew Builds A Waterway - It's the first day of school in Builder Cove... if Rubble & Crew can finish the building in time! / The pups need a construction solution to save Farmer Zoe's crops.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep62
programme.desc: Trailer - When it's time for the Tubby Custard Ride, there's a special trailer the Teletubbies haven't seen before. It's for The Noo-Noo who gets to go on a special Tubby Custard Ride.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S7 Ep20
programme.desc: T - Dee encourages a friend to say 't', and we go on an adventure around the sound. We meet a turtle, shake our tails and see a tiger in a tall tent!

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep13
programme.desc: The Golden Pipsqueak - Mae-Mae wants to spot a rare bird known as The Golden Pipsqueak.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep43
programme.desc: Rumbly Tummy - Messy's tummy is rumbling and so is Lofty the giant's! Luckily the gang are hungry to solve this scientific mystery.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep32
programme.desc: Tradies - Bluey and Bingo hide under the house and spy on two mysterious tradies working in the backyard, wondering what they're up to.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep31
programme.desc: Onesies - When mum's sister Brandy comes over for a visit, she brings the kids onesies as a present, which has an unexpected effect on Bingo.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep2
programme.desc: The Face Painting Badge - The Squirrels are looking for Duggee but can't find him. Instead, they find someone who looks like Enid, only much too big. Duggee has painted his face to look like Enid!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep1
programme.desc: The Carrot Badge - The Squirrels are admiring Duggee's crop of giant carrots when they hear a noise. They find the Rabbits busy preparing for the Carrot Solstice.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep10
programme.desc: The Metal Detector Badge - Roly needs a wee, but the door is locked and Duggee has mislaid the key. Not to worry, Duggee has his metal detector.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep36
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Around The World In 80 Days - It's a rainy day and the team are stuck inside, so Foz reads them his favourite book: Around the World in 80 Days by Jules Verne. The Go Jetters are soon imagining they are characters from the story.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep37
programme.desc: Mars Mission, Chile - Xuli and Foz help NASA after a close encounter with a UFO makes them lose the Mars Rover.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep36
programme.desc: Backpackers - Mum and Dad are going on an adventure wearing the kids as their cheeky backpacks! Seeing the sights and buying street food, backpacking is a blast - until they lose their passports.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep35
programme.desc: Zoo - Bluey's backyard zoo is home to wonderful animals, especially the big blue Daddy gorilla. But when he grabs visitor Bingo and escapes, Zookeeper Bluey must recapture the wild beast.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animals S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Swimming - Andy Day takes a look at young animals as they learn important swimming skills. In New Zealand baby fur seals choose a safe pool in a river.

programme.title: Andy's Dino Toybox S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Dino Birthday Party - Brachiosaurus throws a party for his friends to celebrate his 70th birthday.

programme.title: Dog Squad S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Mission: Muddy Puddle - Meagaidh the Border Collie is a search and rescue dog who works with her owner Tom. Joe and his daughter Kate are lost at the top of a really steep hill. Tom and Meagaidh must race to find them.

programme.title: Aneeshwar and Lizzie Go Wild S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Golden-Headed Lion Tamarin and Poison Dart Frog - Aneeshwar and Lizzie head into the heat of the jungle enclosure to meet a jewel of the jungle, the golden-headed lion tamarin. Next, Aneeshwar and Lizzie meet up with another colourful animal, the poison dart frog. These frogs come in many amazing colours, and they get to meet some blue coloured dart frogs.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S7 Ep10
programme.desc: Yogaarrr - In this episode Captain Captain seems stressed on board the Scarlet Squid, Sandy and Seaweed try to help her and get her to relax using the ancient art of 'Yogaarrr'!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep14
programme.desc: The Train Badge - Duggee is playing with a train set and the squirrels are curious about it.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep13
programme.desc: The Dancing Bug Badge - When a dancing bug lands on Duggee's head, he can't stop dancing.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep12
programme.desc: The Teamwork Badge - A big box is delivered to the Clubhouse and the Squirrels are very excited.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep13
programme.desc: Cheddar Gorge, England - Glitch fills Cheddar Gorge with a river of melted cheese, turning it into a giant cheese fondue. Can the Go Jetters rescue the tourists and sheep from the cheesiest glitch ever?

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep12
programme.desc: Monkey Bay, Thailand - Glitch's plans to open a hotel on an unspoilt beach in Thailand go horribly wrong when a group of macaque monkeys steal his Grim-o-freeze gun.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S24 Ep3
programme.desc: The Great Little Railway Show - When a Railway Show for little engines comes to Sodor, an overly excited Percy finally sees his chance to shine.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep35
programme.desc: Hedge Opera - Sarah is fascinated by some mysterious music coming from the hedge.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep34
programme.desc: Brolly Bus - When Umbrella gets left on the bus, Sarah and Duck head to the bus depot in search of their friend.

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep26
programme.desc: Noisy Night - There's a funny noise around town. It's distracting the children's music practice and keeping everyone else up. Stanley investigates with the help of Myrtle.

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep25
programme.desc: Delivery - Stanley helps Hattie, Fred, and Fifi with a new food delivery service. It starts well, except with each delivery a problem arises. Stanley must solve them before Myrtle's party.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep29
programme.desc: Piggy Dreamer - When Jimmy Jones falls asleep doing some cloud-gazing, Monty wonders what animals dream about.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S3 Ep24
programme.desc: It's Time to Make a Family Tree - Great-Gran Gran shows JoJo an old family photo - it's fun spotting Gran Gran, Mummy and Great-Gran Gran when they were younger. JoJo recognises some people, but there are lots of members of her family that she's never met before.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep17
programme.desc: Pavlova - Mum won't let Bingo have Pavlova, so the kids find a way by playing a cheeky game of Caf in the kitchen. But Dad the chef sets up a competing shop that only serves edamame beans.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep18
programme.desc: Rain - When a heavy summer rain thunders over the Heeler home, Bluey is determined to dam the water in the front yard, while Mum tries to stop her constantly tracking mud into the house.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep19
programme.desc: Pizza Girls - Bluey and Bingo make mud pizzas and deliver them to the grown-ups, but their pedal car's wheel keeps falling off.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep30
programme.desc: The Colour Badge - Duggee is painting in his favourite colouring book. The Squirrels want to have a go too.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep34
programme.desc: The Sleeping Badge - Tag is having trouble sleeping, so Duggee offers him a few tricks to help him.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep28
programme.desc: The Space Badge - Duggee teaches the squirrels all about the stars, the planets and the Milky Way!

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep37
programme.desc: Mars Mission, Chile - Xuli and Foz help NASA after a close encounter with a UFO makes them lose the Mars Rover.

programme.title: Roots & Fruits S2 Ep21
programme.desc: Pak Choi - Live from the Roots and Fruits theatre, it's your favourite show host, Pak Choi, who might be known by many names, but sings about how she's "Always Pak To You!"

programme.title: Roots & Fruits S2 Ep20
programme.desc: Mango - Live from the Roots and Fruits theatre, it's the magical wish granter Mango, ready to make all the Roots and Fruits cast wishes come true.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep27
programme.desc: Wishing Tree - Evil Pea blows all the lanterns away during the Lantern Festival. Supertato struggles to get them all back and needs Broccoli's help to save the day.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep28
programme.desc: Grape Kids' Super Camp - Supertato shows the Grape Kids how to camp Supertato-style, but Evil Pea arrives and wows them with her ice camping. Before long, the Grape Kids need to be rescued by Supertato.

programme.desc: The Current Affairs Documentary - The high-rise housing estates in the north of Marseille are in the grip of drug gangs. Residents of these underserved neighborhoods are forced to live with violence and a lack of opportunities. But not everyone is willing to accept the situation.

programme.desc: News

programme.title: DocFilm
programme.desc: The Truth Behind Chocolate Bunnies - Child Labor in the Cocoa Industry? - Major chocolate manufacturers have pledged to combat and eliminate child labor. They made this commitment more than 20 years ago. But even today, more than a million minors are still working on cocoa plantations. How is this possible?

programme.title: DW News
programme.desc: News

programme.title: The Day
programme.desc: News in Review

programme.title: Eco India
programme.desc: Balancing city growth, nature & quality of life - With more and more people living in cities, how can we improve life in urban areas, ensure food security and ease the burden on the environment? From community and rooftop farms, to cave dwellings and clean air projects in India, Bangladesh and Spain.

programme.title: DW News
programme.desc: News

programme.title: Planet A
programme.desc: How magnets could change our fridges and ACs forever - For centuries, refrigeration tech has stayed the same energy-hungry and reliant on harmful gases. Enter magnetocaloric cooling: a new solution claiming to be 30% more energy-efficient than current cooling systems. And it's scalable. From fridges to cooling buildings and server farms.

programme.title: Arts Unveiled
programme.desc: Arts and Controversy - Which is currently a greater threat to the world of books: Being banned, or being replaced by AI? Arts Unveiled looks into the challenges faced by authors and illustrators, amongst others. Also: a visit to a pixel forest made up of 3,000 LED lights.

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep910AdesanyavsPereira
programme.desc: At UFC 281, dominant middleweight champion Israel Adesanya puts his title on the line against longtime rival, Alex Pereira. See both men train and prepare ahead of their matchup in New Yorks Madison Square Garden.

programme.title: UFC Unleashed Ep1803
programme.desc: Lightweight Title - When Khabib Nurmagomedov retired from MMA, the UFCs lightweight title was up for grabs. See the journey of the 155-pound belt following the Khabib Era on UFC Unleashed. Featuring Charles Oliveira, Dustin Poirier, Islam Makhachev, and more.

programme.title: UFC Connected Ep801
programme.desc: UFC Connected "Origins: Themba Gorimbo, Unbreakable: Njokuani Brothers, Warrior Code: Dricus du Plessis - UFC welterweight Themba Gorimbo reveals how he overcame a life of hardship and adversity, from the trenches of the African gold mines to the biggest stage in MMA. Chidi Njokuani details his life-long journey to the octagon under the guidance and mentorship of his brother Anthony Njokuani, former UFC lightweight contender. UFC Middleweight Champion Dricus du Plessis reveals his keys to success in the octagon.

programme.title: LIGUE 1 TOP 10 COLLECTIVE PLAY
programme.desc: LIGUE 1 TOP 10 COLLECTIVE PLAY - Nothing more satisfying than a flowing team move with the finish. 10 of the best plays from 22/23.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC302MakhachevvsPoirier
programme.desc: One of the most dominant champions in the UFC returns to defend his crown in Newark, New Jersey, as UFC lightweight champion Islam Makhachev puts his 13-fight winning streak on the line against Louisiana superstar Dustin The Diamond Poirier in the main event of UFC 302. A battle for the ages and much more on UFC Reloaded

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep5
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep22
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu.
